paths: Obvious exits: north, east, south, west
description: A cluster of glowing glimaerstones is set into the paneled wooden ceiling, encased in a globe of rainbow glaes.  They suffuse the nexus of two hallways with multihued light that awakens many hues in the grey planking of the deck.  A painted crimson door breaches one wall, standing opposite a painting of a slumbering seaside town.
title: [The Firebird, Main Deck Nexus]
